description: [Versa Director Zero Day Exploitation](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0039) used a non-standard TCP session to initialize communication prior to establishing HTTPS command and control.(Citation: Lumen Versa 2024)

external_references.description: Black Lotus Labs. (2024, August 27). Taking The Crossroads: The Versa Director Zero-Day Exploitaiton. Retrieved August 27, 2024.
